 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקֵבָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==female== (***perforata*** ([[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 166</sup>); so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and most; &gt; another view in [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW xi (1891), 181f.; Idioticon 57</sup>; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נוּקְבָּא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּקְבְּתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — always absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Jer.31.22|Jer 31:22]] + 21 t. (all Pentateuch, and all [[BDB#P|P]] except [[Deut.4.16|Deut 4:16]]): 

**1.** ***woman*** (or female child) [[Jer.31.22|Jer 31:22]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּבֶר‎</span>), [[Gen.1.27|Gen 1:27]]; [[Gen.5.2|Gen 5:2]]; [[Lev.12.5|Lev 12:5]]; [[Lev.12.7|Lev 12:7]]; [[Lev.15.33|Lev 15:33]]; [[Lev.27.4|Lev 27:4]]; [[Lev.27.5|Lev 27:5]]; [[Lev.27.6|Lev 27:6]]; [[Lev.27.7|Lev 27:7]]) [[Num.5.3|Num 5:3]] (all opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָבָר‎</span>), [[Num.31.15|Num 31:15]]. 

**2.** ***female animal*** [[Gen.6.19|Gen 6:19]]; [[Gen.7.3|Gen 7:3]]; [[Gen.7.9|Gen 7:9]]; [[Gen.7.16|Gen 7:16]]; [[Lev.3.1|Lev 3:1]]; [[Lev.3.6|Lev 3:6]] (all opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָכָר‎</span>), [[Lev.4.28|Lev 4:28]]; [[Lev.4.32|Lev 4:32]]; [[Lev.5.6|Lev 5:6]]. — [[Deut.4.16|Deut 4:16]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָכָר‎</span>) may include both women and animals.
